document.full_text: a protest by more than 2,000 residents of suijiang county in yunnan province that lasted for five days was dispersed on tuesday by paramilitary police officers and armored vehicles.
document.title: asia: china: police break up rural protest
lines_and_colors: a protest by more than 2,000 residents of suijiang county in yunnan province that lasted for five days was dispersed on tuesday by paramilitary police officers and armored vehicles.
